title: Game Scoop Episode 603
description: Welcome back to Game Scoop!, IGN's weekly video game podcast. This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are sharing stories of their first week with PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X. Astro's Playroom, Miles Morales, Demon's Souls, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, and so much more.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
